channel.title: Science on A Site:
channel.description: Recent content in Science on A Site:

item.title: Write out in the open
item.description: Introducing A Site Four Sore Eyes This is place where I can publish my ideas for the audience of me. Why would I want to do this? Here are the reasons in no particular order: To get ruminations out of my head and put them out in the public domain so I can read them with fresher or simply differently focused eyes. To allow me to write and publish , but with the only critic I need to answer to being that one, or small set anyway, that reside in me.
